channel.title: does-2023 on Tales about Software Engineering
channel.description: Recent content in does-2023 on Tales about Software Engineering

item.title: DevOps Enterprise Summit - simple paper cranes
item.description: As I am sitting on the 16th floor of the Okura Hotel in Amsterdam in my Batman pyjamas and facing a large mirror, just glimpsing the paper crane that was so lovingly put on my pillow, I’m starting to reflect what has happened during the day. I was lucky enough to be a guest at the DevOps Enterprise Summit. There was certainly plenty of things to get excited about. I’d meet Gene Kim, whose been running this conference for 10 years and who wrote the Phoenix Project.
